snippet: After its victory Sunday, City needs only to beat relegation-threatened Queens Park Rangers at home next weekend to ensure its first league championship since 1968.
abstract: After its victory Sunday, City needs only to beat relegation-threatened Queens Park Rangers at home next weekend to ensure its first league championship since 1968.

headline.main: Tears Come for Manchester City Fans; Trophy May Be Next
headline.print_headline: For Manchester City, Title Is Within Reach
